front.title: Analysis of BGP, LDP, PCEP and MSDP Issues According to KARP Design Guide

abstract.t: This document analyzes Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) [RFC4271], Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) [RFC5036], Path Computation Element Protocol (PCEP) [RFC5440] and Multicast Source Distribution Protocol (MSDP) [RFC3618] according to guidelines set forth in section 4.2 of Keying and Authentication for Routing Protocols Design Guidelines [RFC6518].
